headline.0: 60 Years After Brown v. Board, Will Congress Revive A Dual School System?
headline.1: 60 Years After Brown v. Board, Will Congress Revive A Dual School System?

short_description.0: On the 60th anniversary of Brown v. Board, Congress is set to expand a dual school system. One bound by laws, the other deregulated. One free to select the "winners, " the other bound to accept all.
short_description.1: On the 60th anniversary of Brown v. Board, Congress is set to expand a dual school system. One bound by laws, the other deregulated. One free to select the "winners, " the other bound to accept all.
